item.title: About
item.description: About Me I’m Daniel Hirsch, a Software Engineer at Telespazio specializing in mission control systems. I enjoy solving technical problems and working on complex systems with a focus on reliability and automation. Skills Programming Languages: Python, C++, Java, Bash Containerization: Docker, Docker-Compose, Kubernetes CI/CD: Jenkins, GitLab CI Automation: Scripting, deployment automation, system monitoring Version Control: Git, SVN My Work Philosophy I approach my work by questioning my own knowledge and continuously learning.
